article.name: Is it possible to use more than the plan’s limit?
article.title: Is it possible to use more than the plan’s limit?
article.body:
• Each plan (Standard / Free / Trial) has its own limit on the number of items that can be used.
  • The specified limits for the Free plan and Trial plan cannot be exceeded.
  • With the Standard plan, if you exceed the limit of any of the following items, additional fees are incurred. For more information about additional fees, please see "How usage fees are calculated".
    • Metrics
    • External monitoring
    • Trace spans
  •   By default, the following items cannot be exceeded, but you can request for these limits to be mitigated at no additional charge by contacting Support.
    • Monitors (Host metric monitor, Service metric monitor)
    • Expression monitor
    • Custom dashboards
  • As limit mitigation may take 1 to 2 business days, please let us know in advance.
  • In addition, please understand that we may decline a request depending on the situation.
